metadata.Title: CVE-2021-25684 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
It was discovered that apport in data/apport did not properly open a report file to prevent hanging reads on a FIFO.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-25684` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

apport - 2.20.9-0ubuntu7.23
apport-gtk - 2.20.9-0ubuntu7.23
apport-kde - 2.20.9-0ubuntu7.23
apport-noui - 2.20.9-0ubuntu7.23
apport-retrace - 2.20.9-0ubuntu7.23
apport-valgrind - 2.20.9-0ubuntu7.23
dh-apport - 2.20.9-0ubuntu7.23
python-apport - 2.20.9-0ubuntu7.23
python-problem-report - 2.20.9-0ubuntu7.23
python3-apport - 2.20.9-0ubuntu7.23
python3-problem-report - 2.20.9-0ubuntu7.23
No subscription required

criterions.comment: apport package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.20.9-0ubuntu7.23').
